name: Wisconsin Brat & Beer Cheese Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Beer. Brats. Cheese. You'll be a game day hero when you combine all three in this Wisconsin-inspired dip. Creamy, warm and loaded with Cheddar cheese and cheese curds, it's best enjoyed with soft pretzel dunkers and a cold beer.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh bratwurst sausages, casings removed
1 cup beer, such as Miller® (headquartered in Milwaukee)
1 ½ cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
¾ cup cheese curds or shredded white Cheddar cheese
directions: Cook and crumble sausage in large skillet on medium-high heat until browned
Melt butter in same large skillet on medium heat
Gradually stir in milk, beer and Gravy Mix with whisk until smooth
Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until sauce starts to thicken
Gradually stir in shredded cheese until melted and smooth
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese melts
Serve with soft pretzel bites or pretzel chips
